description: Utility functions for data transformation and aggregation, including safety parsing, normalization, grouping, crosstabulation, correlation, and histogram bucketing, used within a dashboard frontend project.

methods.name: toNumberSafe(val)
methods.description: Attempts to safely parse a value into a finite number, handling null, non-numeric, and messy text inputs.

methods.name: toStr(v, fallback = 'Unknown')
methods.description: Converts a value to a string with trimming, providing a fallback if the result is empty.

methods.name: toDateKey(v)
methods.description: Normalizes date-like strings to 'YYYY-MM-DD' format if possible, else returns original string or null.

methods.name: groupBy(rows, keyFn, reducer, initFactory)
methods.description: Groups array elements by a key extracted via keyFn and aggregates each group using reducer, with optional initial factory.

methods.name: crosstab(rows, rowKeyFn, colKeyFn)
methods.description: Performs cross-tabulation grouping by row and column keys, producing a data matrix with counts.

methods.name: pearsonCorrelation(x, y)
methods.description: Calculates Pearson correlation coefficient between two numeric arrays of equal length.

methods.name: histogramBuckets(values, bucketCount = 10)
methods.description: Creates histogram buckets from numeric values, dividing into specified bucket count.
